AcceptedByOrganization(address).details: emitted when a planter with address {planterId} is accepted by organization

OrganizationJoin(address).details: emitted when an organization join with address {organizationId}

PlanterJoin(address).details: emitted when a planter join with address {planterId}

PlanterUpdated(address).details: emitted when a planters data updated (capacity , planterType)

PortionUpdated(address).details: emited when a planter with address {planterId} payment portion updated

RejectedByOrganization(address).details: emitted when a planter with address {planterId} is rejected by organization

acceptPlanterFromOrganization(address,bo.details: organization can accept planter to be it's member or reject

params._acceptance: accept or reject NOTE emit a {AcceptedByOrganization} or {RejectedByOrganization} event

canAssignTreeToPlanter(address).details: check allowance to assign tree to planter {_planterAddress}

returns._0: true in case of active planter or orgnization planter and false otherwise

canVerify(address,address).details: check that {_verifier} can verify plant or update requests of {_planterAddress}

returns._0: true in case of {_verifier} can verify {_planterAddress} and false otherwise

getPlanterPaymentPortion(address).details: return planter paymentPortion for an accepted organizationPlanter

params._planterAddress: address of planter to get payment portion

returns._0: {true} as first param in valid planter case and seccond param is address of organization that {_planterAddress} is member of it. and third param is address of referral and the last one is portion value
true in case of Planter contract have been initialized

organizationJoin(address,uint64,uint64,u.details: admin add a plater as organization (planterType 2) so planterType 3 can be member of these planters.

params._refferedBy: address of referral NOTE emit a {OrganizationJoin} event

planterCheck(address).details: check that planter {_planterAddress} can plant regular tree

params._planterAddress: address of planter NOTE treeFactory contract can call this function NOTE change status to full capacity if plantedCount be equal with planter capacity after increase plantedCount by 1

returns._0: true in case of planter status is active {1}

planterJoin(uint8,uint64,uint64,uint16,a.details: based on {_planterType} a planter can join as individual planter or member of an organization

params._organizationAddress: address of organization to be member of NOTE if join as a member of an organization, when that organization accept planter, planter status set to active NOTE emit a {PlanterJoin} event
params._planterType: 1 for individual and 3 for member organization

plantingPermission(address,address).details: return if a planter can plant a tree and increase planter plantedCount 1 time.

params._assignedPlanterAddress: address of planter that tree assigned to
params._planterAddress: address of planter who want to plant tree

returns._0: if a planter can plant a tree or not

reducePlantCount(address).details: when tree plant of {_planterAddress} rejected plantedCount of {_planterAddress} must reduce 1 time and if planter status is full capacity {2} update it to active {1}

params._planterAddress: address of planter NOTE only treeFactory contract can call this function

params._capacity: capacity that set to planter capacity NOTE emit a {PlanterUpdated} event
params._planterAddress: address of planter to update capacity

updateOrganizationPlanterPayment(address.details: oragnization can update planterPayment rules of it's members

params._planterAutomaticPaymentPortion: payment portion value NOTE only organization (planterType = 2) can call this function NOTE emit a {PortionUpdated} event

updatePlanterType(uint8,address).details: planter with type 1 , 3 can update their planterType using this function. planterType 3 (member of organization) can change to planterType 1 (individual planter) with input value {_planterType} of 1 and zeroAddress as {_organizationAddress} or choose other organization to be member of with input value {_planterType} of 3 and {_organizationAddress}. planterType 1 can only change to planterType 3 with input value {_planterAddress} of 3 and {_organizationAddress} if planter type 3 choose another oraganization or planterType 1 chage to planterType 3, they must be accepted by the organization to be an active planter NOTE emit a {PlanterUpdated} event
